refsynopsisdiv.title: Description
refsynopsisdiv.para: This function loads and starts execution of DSP application generated from XCos diagram. Generated application should run infinitely (duration in mdaq_setup block should be set to -1) and its termination must be done with mdaq_dsp_stop() function call. Function uses TCP/IP for data exchange between DSP and Scilab. DSP application starts immediately sends data to Scilab. In order to receive signal data the mdaq_dsp_signal_read() function needs to be used.

WARNING: TCP/IP protocol is used for data exchange - make sure that after DSP work is done the mdaq_dsp_stop() is called - otherwise next attempt to start DSP application with mdaq_dsp_start() will fail and MicroDAQ device reboot will be needed!
